content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the author’s purpose in the passage?

choices.label: To describe how a potentially harmful tendency helped her to succeed as a writer
To explain why beginning writers need to receive more honest criticism
To correct the misperception that writing science fiction rarely proves lucrative
To express appreciation for her mother’s support throughout her writing career

content.answer: To describe how a potentially harmful tendency helped her to succeed as a writer

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
